name: VersionIOSPlistManifest
description: Applies a version to an iOS Plist Manifest via the CFBundleShortVersionString and CFBundleVersion property based on the build number.
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for manifest files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extracted from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000' format

inputs.name: VersionNameFormat
inputs.label: Version Name Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of version number to apply as Version Name. Assumes starting from the beginning of the version number.

inputs.name: Injectversion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True use the injected version without formatting as directly entered for both CFBundleShortVersionString and CFBundleVersion

inputs.name: CFBundleVersionFormat
inputs.label: CFBundleVersion Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the part(s) of the version number to use for the CFBundleVersion.

inputs.name: CFBundleShortVersionStringFormat
inputs.label: CFBundleShortVersionString Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the part(s) of the version number to use for the CFBundleShortVersionString

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter to extract build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter to get build number from the build name.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
